title: Stew Leonard Jr. on Top Holiday Items, Viral Cookie Milk
description: Stew Leonard Jr., President and CEO of Stew Leonard’s, discusses beef supply and demand and rising food costs ahead of the holidays with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” He says higher labor costs and a sharp increase in energy prices are putting pressure on food prices. (Source: Bloomberg)
